div.ab:
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
جعلني اللّه فداك وأطال اللّه
بقاك سبحان اللّه العليم
ما سمعت لك خبر منذ كثير
وأنا عليل لم تجئ ولم
تسل عنّي واللّه المستعان
وقد صار إليك غلامي
وأحب أن تتفضّل تأمر
غلامك أن يشتري لي أفين
على حسابي ومالي إن شا اللّه
جعلت فداك وأطال اللّه
بقاك وعزّك

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
ǧaʿala nī ăl lāhu fidāʾa ka wa ʾaṭāla ăl lāhu
baqāʾa ka subḥāna ăl lāhi ăl ʿalīmi
mā samiʿtu la ka ḫabar munḏu kaṯīr
wa ʾanā ʿalīl:un lam taǧiʾ wa lam
tasal ʿann ī wa ăl lāhu ăl mustaʿānu
wa qad ṣāra ʾilay ka ġulām ī
wa ʾuḥibbu ʾan tatafaḍḍala taʾmuru
ġulāma ka ʾan yaštariya l ī ʾafīn
ʿalà ḥisāb ī wa māl ī ʾin šāʾa ăl lāhu
ǧuʿiltu fidāʾa ka wa ʾaṭāla ăl lāhu
baqāʾa ka wa ʿizza ka

In the Name &c. In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful!
God make me your ransom and prolong May God make me thy ransom and may God prolong
thy life. Praise be to God, the All-knowing! your continuance! Praise be to God the knowing!
I have heard no news of thee for a long time, I have heard no news of you for a long time,
and I have been ill and you neither came nor while I have been ill, and thou neither camest nor didst thou
enquire about me, and God's help must be implored. enquired about me; God help us!
My slave has come to thee My slave has come to you
and I wish that thou hast the kindness to order and I wish you would have the kindness to order
thy slave to buy me opium your slave to buy me opium
on my account and at my cost, if God wills! on my account and at my cost, please God.
May I be made thy ransom, and may God prolong May I be made your ransom, and may God prolong
thy life and might. your continuance and might!
